channel.title: mitmproxy on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in mitmproxy on Memo Tut

item.title: Created an HTTP proxy that can record and play HTTP responses
item.description: As the title suggests, we have created an HTTP proxy that can record and play HTTP responses. #What did you want I’m developing a crawler at work, and I’ve always wanted something to mock an external service and return an HTTP response to write a system-wide E2E test using the crawler. The four features we were looking for were: 1. HTTP response is recorded and response can be made based on the recorded data 2.
